description: These tasty little parcels of spicy pork are served with a robust relish. The raisins in the filling complement the meat and spices perfectly.
keywords: Spicy Pork Empanaditas With Chunky Avocado Relish
name: Spicy Pork Empanaditas With Chunky Avocado Relish Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cover cling film tightly over the surface of the relish. Refrigerate for 15 minutes. Serve empanadas warm or at room temperature with relish for dipping.
